title: Reported for Playing Ivern....
body: Ok I went into a normal game today hoping to have some fun, I end up in the jungle role and decide to play Ivern. The early game was going pretty fine and all, then our Lucian disconnected. So our thresh requested help so I went down to bot and he went ad thresh and I supported. Our illaoi started telling me "why would you play Ivern hes useless.." which confused me because I thought in a NORMAL game you had the right to play whatever you want heck, a few games ago I went ad Azir and my team was fine with it. Then they started telling the enemy team "report ivern for playing ivern and trolling", which I wasn't trolling. Then the rest of the team ganged up on me and tldr, we lost the game. It disturbs me how these people got up me for playing a champ whos apparently useless, which I guess Ivern isn't that great at the moment but like I said before its a NORMAL game. (Sorry for making you read a novel).

You can't get reported for non meta, and they hardly ever ban for feeding and flaming anyway.

They will make a system to detect where you are what damage you taken to grade you but will not make something to automatically analyze the chat.

You have the right to play whoever you want regardless of whether it's normal or ranked. The META is *not* enforced by Riot. The Illaoi would've just been invalidating their own reports by reporting you.

The main difference between normals and ranked, though, is that ranked is a lot more competitive and has a much larger focus on teamwork and synergy, so it is a bit more strict in how you can go about it.
